title: What are the state emission inspection requirements for automobiles, specifically those over 25 years old?
text:
Because of the volume of questions we're getting, we are
unable to personally answer your question regarding vehicles over 25
years old. But here are links that will help answer your question.



http://www.chathamjournal.com/weekly/news/government/frequently-asked-question.shtml



http://www.ncdot.org/DMV/moving/newnc/emissions.html
